title: 帕内塔：希望中东和平(2/2)

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

Today, millions of Chinese senior high school students take the college entrance examination, commonly known as Gaokao, which is considered to be one of the turning points in our life. Almost all of us took the college entrance examination. Some fulfill their dream about ideal universities while some not. Anyway, it is our first choice of our future，which is a milestone for us.
今天，百万考生坐在高考的考场上。高考是我们人生的转折点之一。
我们中的大多数人都参加了高考。一些人如愿以偿，考入了梦寐以求的大学。而一些没有。
不论怎样，高考都是我们第一次做出重大选择，这是一个里程碑。

话题：

1 What would you like to say to yourself in the year when you took the CEE?
你想对参加高考那年的自己说些什么？
2 Some people argue that CEE is not fair at all. What do you think of it?
3 Have you ever regreted not studying hard in high school which resulted in a unsatisfied college or future?
4 Anything related to this topic you would like to share with us.

范例1：

It seems that college entrance examination is an inevitable test if you desire to succeed in China, especially you have nothing but your knowledge in your mind. However, its fairness and justice has been questioned by numerous people for quiet a long time. The unfairness reveals in many aspects, particularly in regional differences. In other words, the student enrollment percentage of the same university varies in different provinces. To be honest, the college entrance examination is not fair at the moment. But it is the most fairest examination at present compared to other tests in China, such as postgraduate examination. Facing such injustice, the only thing we can do now is to hold a positive attitude towards it and to do whatever we can to make sure its fairness in the future.

范例2：

The annual big event for secondary school students, College Entrance Examination, is approaching. Therefore, the controversy about the fairness of CEE has became a hot topic on the media. Some people complaint about the system of current CEE for its biased criteria for students from different regions. Personally, I think the CEE is a relatively fair exam at the moment.

Yes. It is undeniable that there is an obvious problem in CEE. China, however, is a great country with large populations and dealing with the enrollment of college students has never been an easy task. The Ministry of Education have to take account of the political issues, historical issues and geographic issues. For instance, to augment the average population quality, the CEE is designed for being beneficial to the undeveloped areas in terms of education.

Nevertheless, the CEE is a relatively fair exam at present. Thanks to its pivotal role in student’s life, hardly could students cheat in this exam. And almost all the students are enrolled by a uniform standard – the CEE score. Apparently, the CEE is a good opportunity for the students who have no particular backgrounds or from rural areas to change their future life by attending a university with a top-tier reputation.

Although there is a widely criticised issue existing in current CEE, we cannot ignore that the CEE is changing and adapting itself to new needs of the whole people.
范例3：

If I could talk to myself at 18, the year when I took the CEE, the first thing I would like to say is that it’s going to be a year of pain and sweat. You may doubt about the meaning of life, but trust me, you’ll make through this. You’ll see tremendous scenes, meet kind people and you’ll find the answer before long. Then I’d say thank you for your hard-working, even though it isn't the best result, but it turns out to be the best-fit one. Plus, everytime you have a fight with your best friend, just speak in a mild voice, because friendship like that is genuine and rare. At the end of the talk, I’d say you’ve got so much up ahead. Have a little faith and you'll see.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Doris (lsy34)

23秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

If you're hanging on to your possessions, or you're hanging on to the regrets that you have and thinking in terms of the customary Buddhist pattern of understanding that there's a pattern of past lives and future lives we're all experiencing, so the present life is one of a large sequence. And so the basic process of Buddhist practice and the underlying current of it is to try to end rebirth altogether.如果你紧握住你的财富不放，或是放不下过去的悔恨，那么以传统的佛教模式思考，或者说理解存在前世和来世，今生只是一长串序列中的一部分。所以佛教修行的基本过程及其潜在的趋势是终止轮回转世。

语调示意图：

重点单词发音讲解：
possession /pəˈzeʃ.ən/
customary /ˈkʌs.tə.mər.i/
pattern /ˈpæt.ən/
sequence /ˈsiːkwəns/
experience /ɪkˈspɪə.ri.ənts/

title: BBC模仿秀: 轮回之归途

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍：

The Weepies，一只由Deb Talan和Steve Tannen组成的流行民谣二重奏，其作品旋律简单，音乐流畅，音韵恬淡，清新自然，作品有男女独唱，亦有男女声混唱。
2005年12月，The Weepies录制完成第二张专辑“Say I Am You”，并于2006年3月正式发行，并凭借这张专辑被主流音乐市场所接受。专辑在2006年2月曾经在8个国家的“iTunes下载次数最多的Folk专辑榜”上攀升到首位，而单曲"World Spins Madly On"也在美国的iTunes Folk歌曲榜上获得了冠军。

专辑的名字"Say I Am You"引自一位13世纪作家Jelaluddin Rumi的作品，这位作家以创作带有强烈信仰、热情爱意的诗歌著称，所以这张专辑的主题毫无疑问就是爱情。有些时候，爱情会隐藏起来或者丢失，有时爱情也会是虚假的，但是最终一定会有一种爱情被发现、被呵护。

Gotta Have You -- The Weepies

模唱片段：

Gray, quiet and tired and mean,
Picking at a worried seam
I try to make you mad at me over the phone
Red eyes and fire and signs
I'm taken by a nursery rhyme
I want to make a ray of sunshine and never leave home

*No amount of coffee
No amount of crying
No amount of whiskey
No amount of wine
No... nothing else will do
I've gotta have you
I've gotta have you

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：momo3ma

24秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：Band members say this record was difficult. Several very successful and persuasive producers were involved in the process. Lead singer Brandon Flowers says he was nervous about whether the new work would be liked. He said,"bands that say they don't care about how their records sell are liars."

译文：乐队成员称这张专辑有点难产，幸而一些知名且很有影响力的制作人加入到专辑的创作中来。主唱布兰登·弗劳尔斯因不知这张专辑能否广受欢迎而焦虑不安。他说：“乐队要是说对唱片销量毫不关心那纯粹是撒谎。”

重点单词发音讲解：

persuasive /pɚˈsweɪsɪv/
involved /ɪnˈvɑ:lvd/
process /ˈprɑ:ˌsɛs/
new /ˈnu:/

title: 重金属乐队发行绝赞新砖(1/2)

description:
《美剧天坛秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：Did you see anything?
Who told you I was at the campground?
I saw you in the crowd when then were putting Hanna in the ambulance.I wasn't sure then,but I'm sure now. It was you.
It was supposed to be a joke.
A joke?
Yeah,like a movie.Bunch of girls in the woods,I went out there to give you guys a scare.I saw you going off,so I followed you. Followed you to his car.

重点单词发音讲解：

crowd
英[kraud] 美[kraud]
n. 人群，一伙；一堆，许多，大众
v. 拥挤；挤满，挤进
 
ambulance
英[ˌæmbjələns] 美[ˌæmbjələns]
n. 救护车
 
scare
英[skeə] 美[skeə]
v. 使惊恐，吓唬；受惊吓，感到害怕
n. 惊恐，惊吓；大恐慌
